name: voilib
description: Voilib is a self-hosted media library and catalog web app, aimed at organizing video or audio collections with metadata, search, and categorization.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize video and audio collections with metadata and descriptions

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find media quickly using full-text search across titles and metadata

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Add and edit metadata including titles, descriptions, and tags

features.title: Filtering
features.description: Filter media by category, tags, or other attributes to find specific items

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access your media catalog through a clean web interface from any device
